Name: CABARET 4 CARD

[/] Only 4 'logical battles' [/] Only 4 cards in your hand. It will be distributed randomly, but it will be all open from the beginning. There is no luck factor after the hand is dealt. Victory / defeat conditions change for each move [/] 'If you win, you win' 'If you win, you lose' 'If you win the last one, you win' ... The two players alternately put cards into play one by one.
